author: denizsun
body:
#### PR description:

  - A new plot BadQualityEvents vs all LS is added, 
  - Changes of error and warning alarm thresholds from 1 to 0.994 for both CapID and BadQEvents
 
#### PR validation:

<!-- runTheMatrix test is done

#### This is not a backport PR.
title: [HCAL-DQM] New plot BadQualityEvents vs all LS and changes of alarm threshold for CapID and BadQEvents for CMSSW_14_1_X
